#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
#define N 1003001
bool prime[N+1];
void sieve(){
    memset(prime,true,sizeof(prime));
    for(ll i=3LL;i*i<=N;i+=2LL){
        if(prime[i]){
            for(ll j=i*i;j<=N;j+=(2LL*i)){
                prime[j]=false;
            }
        }
    }
}
ll reverse(ll m){
    ll rev=0;
    while(m){
        rev=10*rev+(m%10);
        m/=10;
    }
    return rev;
}
int main() {
    sieve();
    ll n,m;
    cin>>n;
    if(n<=2LL){
        m=2LL;
    }else if(n&1){
        for(m=n;;m+=2){
           if(prime[m]&&(m==reverse(m))){
                break;
           }
        }
    }else{
        for(m=n+1;;m+=2){
            if(prime[m]&&(m==reverse(m))){
                break;
           }
        }
    }
    cout<<m<<endl;
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
